Content.Text:
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>! Are you here? I'm coming in!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Haah, haah... I'm sorry for showing up
so suddenly.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
This is a bit of an emergency. My
parents are here, in the next town over.
They just got in touch with me!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, I'm going to go and meet them
now.
<PAGE>
Do you think, if you have time, that you
could come with me? What do you think?
I'll go with you!
I'll just wait here

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
T-Thank you! I'm so happy!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's depart immediately. My parents are
waiting.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
It's fine, I'm just... just a little
nervous. Don't worry.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Do you think my father will understand?
Will I be able to let him know how I
feel, in a way he'll understand?
<PAGE>
What happens if it all goes wrong? I
can't help but think negatively.
I'm starting to get worried too
You'll be fine!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I-I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. My anxiety seems to
be contagious!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It will be fine, I'm sure! I've got you
at my side, <MYNAME>, after all!
<PAGE>
Let's try and look positively on this.
Come on.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. You're right. It's important to
go into this believing that everything
will work out.
<PAGE>
It will be fine, I'm sure! I've got you
at my side, <MYNAME>, after all!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm even starting to look forward to
seeing them again. Let's go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you very much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was quite surprised to see not just
my parents but also my brothers!
<PAGE>
With the help of everyone together we
managed to win my father over. He's
agreed to me becoming a blacksmith.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was my mother's letter and you,
<MYNAME>, who put me on the path to this
resolution.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you hadn't talked to me like that
then I doubt I'd ever have made up with
my father.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>And it was such a big help having you at
my side today, too. That's what allowed
me to tell him exactly how I felt.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I've made up with my father, and I'm
feeling really happy. Allow me to thank
you for everything.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
A-Also... It gave me a chance to
introduce you to my parents.
<PAGE>
You were lovely when you said hello to
them! Very impressive. It was all quite
exciting.
<PAGE>
I'm so happy that you are my boyfriend.
Truly!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go home, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
O-Of course. I shouldn't rely on you for
everything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll go and see them alone. I'll let you
know how it turns out.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, it's me, Iroha. I'm coming
in!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I resolved everything with my
father!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not just my parents, but my brothers
came too. With my mothers help we all
managed to persuade him.
<PAGE>
He gave his permission for me to become
a blacksmith, and for me to train here!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
It was my mother's letter and you,
<MYNAME>, who put me on the path to this
resolution. Thank you so much!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm so happy that you are my boyfriend.
Truly!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll head home now, anyway. I'll see you
again soon, <MYNAME>.
